price: ߒ ߣߌ߫ ߖߐ ߟߋ߬ ߒ ߡߏߦߌ߫ ߟߏ߲ ߣߌ߫ ߒ ߛߊ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߒ ߢߣߊߡߊ ߟߊߥߟߌ߬ ߟߏ߲
arabic: وَٱلسَّلَٰمُ عَلَيَّ يَوۡمَ وُلِدتُّ وَيَوۡمَ أَمُوتُ وَيَوۡمَ أُبۡعَثُ حَيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wal-salāmu ʿalayya yawma wulidttu wayawma amūtu wayawma ub'ʿathu ḥayyan
